item.description:
My husband has been to this and he had a great time. The karts are cool because they actually run on gas, not electricity. The track sounds very 'adult' - "sharp turns, a corkscrew and tunnel, rolling hills and off-camber corners."

(Side note: you *do* have to have a valid license - doesn't say if it has to be a MA license).

They also have food so we could grab dinner afterwards. Convenient.

The price is $28 a track and the number of laps on either of the two tracks varies. It sounds like a lot of fun and we're dying to go! :-)

Is 4 PM good or should we make it earlier?

Hope to see you guys there! :-)
item.name: F1 Boston - indoor kart racing
